member.name: ServerInformation
member.summary: Represents the implementation of a Component Object Model (COM) interface in a server process.

member.name: ServerInformation.dwServerPid
member.summary: The process ID of the server.

member.name: ServerInformation.dwServerTid
member.summary: The thread ID of the server object if it's in the STA, 0 if it's in the MTA, and 0x0000FFFF if it's in the NA.

member.name: ServerInformation.ui64ServerAddress
member.summary: ui64ServerAddress is considered a 64-bit value type, rather than a pointer to a 64-bit value, and isn't a pointer to an object in the debugger process. Instead, this address is passed to the function.
